conditions-magic.name: Critical Up Improvement 1
conditions-magic.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Magic Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-magic.name: Magic Up Improvement 1
conditions-magic.desc: Passive skill that increases Magic in accordance to level(Magic + Level x 0.15).

conditions-magic.name: Critical Up Improvement 2
conditions-magic.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Magic Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-magic.name: Limit Break Chance Up Improvement 1
conditions-magic.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Magic Combat that increases limit break chance in accordance to level (Limit Break Chance + Level x 0.05).

conditions-melee.name: Critical Up Improvement 1
conditions-melee.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Melee Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-melee.name: Strength Up Improvement 1
conditions-melee.desc: Passive skill that increases Power in accordance to level(Power + Level x 0.15).

conditions-melee.name: Limit Break Chance Up Improvement 1
conditions-melee.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Melee Combat that increases limit break chance in accordance to level (Limit Break Chance + Level x 0.05).

conditions-ranged.name: Critical Up Improvement 1
conditions-ranged.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Ranged Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-ranged.name: Speed Up Improvement 1
conditions-ranged.desc: Passive skill that increases speed in accordance to level(Speed + Level x 0.15).

conditions-ranged.name: Critical Up Improvement 2
conditions-ranged.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Ranged Combat that increases critical in accordance to level (Critical + Level x 0.5).

conditions-ranged.name: Limit Break Chance Up Improvement 1
conditions-ranged.desc: Passive skill learned by the Conditions of Ranged Combat that increases limit break chance in accordance to level (Limit Break Chance + Level x 0.05).

craftsmanship.name: Manus Up
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that will allow you to withdraw the effects of a Manus Item during cultivation.

craftsmanship.name: Slot Chance
craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that increases the chance of having additional Modification Slot during cultivation.

craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that will allow you to withdraw the effects of a Manus Item during cultivation.

craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that will allow you to withdraw the effects of a Manus Item during cultivation.

craftsmanship.desc: Passive skill that increases the chance of having additional Modification Slot during cultivation.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Erosion Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that eats at the body and soul of surrounding enemies, and has a low probability of inflicting various adverse effects.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Delay Hex Yang
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that interferes with the target's timing. Increases enemy's incantation time by 50%.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Slash Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that eats at the target's spirit and mind. Increases the target's susceptibility to Close-range attacks by 100%. Effect lasts until knockback of target, or for 30 seconds.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Bullet Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that eats at the target's spirit and mind. Increases the target's susceptibility to Long-range attacks by 100%. Effect lasts until knockback of target, or for 30 seconds.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Spell Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that eats at the target's spirit and mind. Increases the target's susceptibility to Magic attacks by 100%. Effect lasts until knockback of target, or for 30 seconds.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Curse of the Slow Cure
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that slows down the recovery of its victim by eating away at the victim's body. Reduces the target's Curative Resistance by 100%. Effect lasts for 30 seconds.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Delay Hex Yin
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that interferes with the target's timing. Increases skill cooldown time by 50%.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Damage Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A sinister curse, that causes the target to receive attacks in succession (grants Null knockback). Effect lasts for 15 seconds.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Curse of the Broken Mirror
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: Spreads a curse over a wide area that nullifies Tetrakarn and Makarakarn.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Corrosion Hex
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that eats at the body and soul of surrounding enemies, and has a low probability of inflicting various adverse effects.

curse-of-the-wretched.name: Curse of the Four Wounds
curse-of-the-wretched.desc: A curse that has a low probability to reduce elemental resistances of surrounding enemies by 30%.

enhancement.name: Divine Heal
enhancement.desc: Through the grace of a High Spirit, all party members in the area are healed, and HP regeneration rate raised for 5 minutes.

enhancement.name: Pulse of Assult
enhancement.desc: The pulsating heart of aggression exalts the party members. The user and party members in the area have their damage increased for 30 seconds. (XX% boost dependent on Intelligence level)

enhancement.name: Pulse of Solid
enhancement.desc: The pulsating heart of resistance exalts the party members. The user and party members in the area have their defense increased for 30 seconds. (XX% boost dependent on Intelligence level)

enhancement.name: Pulse of Armored
enhancement.desc: Gives one member in the party a valiant heart that knows no surrender. Temporarily cancels knockback from received attacks for 30 seconds.

enhancement.name: Clock Cut
enhancement.desc: Blessing that raises the mind of one targeted party member. The target who receives this support spell will have a reduced incantation time of 50% for one skill.

enhancement.name: Divine Blessing
enhancement.desc: Through the grace of a High Spirit, all party members in the area are healed, and HP regeneration rate raised for 5 minutes. (Higher healing modifier than Divine Heal)

enhancement.name: Clock Off
enhancement.desc: Blessing that raises the mind of one targeted party member. The target who receives this support spell will have a reduced incantation time of 100% for one skill.

enhancement.name: Divine Shield
enhancement.desc: Through the protection of a High Spirit, all party members in the area will repel physical attacks up to twice. Shield lasts for 5 minutes.

enhancement.name: Divine Barrier
enhancement.desc: Through the protection of a High Spirit, all party members in the area will repel magical attacks up to twice. Shield lasts for 5 minutes.

enhancement.name: Divine Grace
enhancement.desc: Through the grace of a High Spirit, all party members in the area are healed, and have all of their status ailments cured. (Higher healing modifier than Divine Blessing)

enhancement.name: Impulse of Armored
enhancement.desc: Gives all surrounding party members a valiant heart that knows no surrender. Temporarily cancels knockback from received attacks for 30 seconds.

magic-bullet.name: Squall Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Atavaka mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Force-based and inflicts Stun effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Toxic Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Mamayuri mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Magic-based and inflicts Poison effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Forgetful Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Mamayuri mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Magic-based and inflicts Amnesia effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Arm Snipe
magic-bullet.desc: Through precise aim, snipe your foe's source of power. The enemy's Slash, Thrust and Blunt-based attacks are weakened.

magic-bullet.name: Enchanting Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Ragaraja mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Mind-based and inflicts Charm effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Spell Mute Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Mamayuri mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Magic-based and inflicts Mute effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Scorching Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Ucchusama mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Fire-based and inflicts Burn effect at high success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Hailing Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Yamantaka mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Ice-based and inflicts Freeze effect at a high success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Thundering Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Vajrayaksa mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Electric-based and inflicts Shock effect at low success rate.

magic-bullet.name: Blinding Bullet Hole
magic-bullet.desc: Kundali mantra magic shot. Changes bullet to Nerve-based and inflicts Blind effect at high success rate.

magic-fist.name: Kamaitachi
magic-fist.desc: Surrounds yourself with a vacuum, slicing enemies you pass to bits. Inflicts Force-based damage on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Freezing Lance
magic-fist.desc: Clads yourself in cold, and freezes enemies' blood with a thrust. Inflicts Ice-based damage on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Sonic Through
magic-fist.desc: Creates an electric field and electrocutes your foes. Inflicts Electric-based damage on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Delorean
magic-fist.desc: A trail of fire from your feet burns all enemies in your path. Inflicts Fire-based damage on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Spell Runner
magic-fist.desc: Inflicts Mystic-based damage and Mute ailment on all enemies in range.

magic-fist.name: Devil Heart Breaker
magic-fist.desc: A deadly feat of magic that penetrates even a Demon's heart. Inflicts Almighty-based damage on all enemies in range.

three-forms.name: White of Swords
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Magic Defense, increase ones Strength (Strength +25, Magic Defense -15).

three-forms.name: White of Guns
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Magic Defense, increase ones Speed (Speed + 25, Magic Defense - 15).

three-forms.name: White of Magic
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Physical Defense, increase ones Magic (Magic +25, Physical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: White of Summons
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Physical Defense, increase the ability of Partners (Demon STR, SPD, & MAG +10, Physical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: White of Blades
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases Melee Attack Power (Close Range +5).

three-forms.name: White of Firing
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases Long Range Attack Power (Long Range +5).

three-forms.name: White of Chants
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases Spell Power (Spell +5).

three-forms.name: White of Servants
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases the ability of Partners (CLS-R, LNG-R, Spell & Support +2).

three-forms.name: Red of Swords
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Physical Defense, increase ones Strength (Strength +40, Physical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: Red of Guns
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Physical Defense, increase ones Speed (Speed +40, Physical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: Red of Magic
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Magical Defense, increase ones Magic (Magic +40, Magical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: Red of Summons
three-forms.desc: Switch Skill. At the cost of Magical Defense, increase the ability of Partners (Demon STR, SPD, & MAG +15, Magical Defense -15).

three-forms.name: Red of Blades
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases Melee Attack Power (Close Range +10).

three-forms.name: Red of Firing
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases Long Range Attack Power (Long Range +10).

three-forms.name: Red of Chants
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases Spell Power (Spell +10).

three-forms.name: Red of Servants
three-forms.desc: Passive Skill that increases the ability of Partners (CLS-R, LNG-R, Spell & Support +4).

miitama.name: Mitama Demon Sympathy 1
miitama.desc: Passive skill that increases the experience acquisition of your summoned sacred soul Devil (+5% experience acquisition to Mitama Demon).

miitama.name: Mitama Demon Sympathy 2
miitama.desc: Passive skill that increases the experience acquisition of your summoned sacred soul Devil (+5% experience acquisition to Mitama Demon).

miitama.name: Mitama Demon Sympathy 3
miitama.desc: Passive skill that increases the experience acquisition of your summoned sacred soul Devil (+5% experience acquisition to Mitama Demon).

miitama.name: Mitama Demon Enhancement - Iron Man
miitama.desc: Testimony to your Mitamas' enhancement. Ability granted by Mitama Fusion is increased.

rampage.name: Attack Cool-down Time -25%
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Cool-down time of attack is reduced by 25% (No effect takes place, attack has no cool-down time).

rampage.name: Rush Cool-down Time -25%
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Cooldown time of rush is reduced by 25%.

rampage.name: Counter Cool-down Time -25%
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Cool-down time of counter is reduced by 25%.

rampage.name: Spin Cool-down Time -25%
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Cool-down time of spin is reduced by 25%.

rampage.name: Attack Stack +1
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Attack stack is increased by 1.

rampage.name: Rush Stack +1
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Rush stack is increased by 1.

rampage.name: Counter Stack +1
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Counter stack is increased by 1.

rampage.name: Spin Stack +1
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Spin stack is increased by 1

rampage.name: Attack Power +20%
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Attack power is increased by 20%.

rampage.name: Rush Power +20%
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Rush power is increased by 20%.

rampage.name: Counter Power +20%
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Counter power is increased by 20%.

rampage.name: Spin Power +20%
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Spin power is increased by 20%.

rampage.name: HP Cost - 25%
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. HP Cost for all skills is reduced by 25%.

rampage.name: Weapon-affinity up
rampage.desc: One of the ultimate rampage skills known by roughnecks. Damage for all weapon-based skills +25%.

regal-presence.name: Lord of Serfs
regal-presence.desc: Reduces demon's LNG-R, ClS-R, and Spell by 5. Increases Cls-R by 10 and Critical by 40

regal-presence.name: Lord of Soldiers
regal-presence.desc: Decreases Spin cool-down and incantation time by 50%. Increases Critical by 160. Decreases Spin damage by 20%.

regal-presence.name: Lord of Martyrs
regal-presence.desc: Increases Attack damage by 60%. Reduces Critical by 30 and Spin damage by 20%

regal-presence.name: Lord of the Blood Axe
regal-presence.desc: Increases Attack damage by 50%. Increases Critical by 40. Increases Rush and Spin incantation time by 15%.

regal-presence.name: Lord of Knights
regal-presence.desc: Increases Rush damage by 25% and Critical by 100. Increases Rush incantation time by 15%.

regal-presence.name: Lord of the Beasts
regal-presence.desc: Increases Spin damage by 40%. Increases Spin cool-down time by 50%.

regal-presence.name: Lord of Armor
regal-presence.desc: Null Knockback, Null Incapacitate (damage does not interrupt incantation). Decreases General-Damage dealt by 100%. Decreases damage received by 50%.

regal-presence.name: Lord of Fighters
regal-presence.desc: Increases Close-Range damage by 40%. Increases damage received by 20%.

regal-presence.name: Lord of Courage
regal-presence.desc: Increases Rush damage by 50%. Increases Rush incantation and cool-down time by 10%.

regal-presence.name: Lord of Courage
regal-presence.desc: Increases Close-Range damage by 25%, and +100 critical. Increases damage received by 30%.

regal-presence.name: Lord of Courage
regal-presence.desc: Increases Critical Defense by 150, and enables you to survive lethal blows with a 10% chance. Increases cool-down time for all skills by 20%.

support-bullet.name: Enchant Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Skill to shoot bullets of biological magnetite energy. It is possible to use on yourself and other players (Grants status Element Up (Increases damage of four attribute affinity skills)).

support-bullet.name: Critical Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Skill to shoot bullets of biological magnetite energy. It is possible to use on yourself and other players (Grants status Critical Up (Increases chance of critical)).

support-bullet.name: Assault Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Skill to shoot bullets of biological magnetite energy. It is possible to use on yourself and other players (Grants status Assault Up (Increases damage dealt)).

support-bullet.name: Ability Tuner
support-bullet.desc: Skill to shoot bullets of biological magnetite energy. It is possible to use on yourself and other players (Grants status Ability Up (Increases all stats by 1)).

synthesis.name: Tarot Fusion
synthesis.desc: A secret art that fuses the power contained within Demon Crystals and Tarot Cards with equipment. When successful, the crystal or card is lost, but the equipment acquires special powers. When unsuccessful, the equipment's Durability decreases.

synthesis.name: Crystallize Demon
synthesis.desc: A secret art that fuses summoned demons with certain jewels to create Demon Crystals. When successful, the demon is lost, but a Demon Crystal is acquired in its stead. When unsuccessful, the jewel is lost and Friendship level with the demon drops.

synthesis.name: Soul Stone Fusion
synthesis.desc: With this secret art, you can fuse Demon Crystals and Soul Stones together with Equipment. When successful, both the crystal and stone is lost but a special power is added to the Equipment. When unsuccessful, the Equipment's durability is decreased and both the crystal and stone is lost.
